comment: I am not a Nazi, I do not support Nazis and I am very Pro-Israel. If any of this offends you PLEASE MUTE me and unfollow me..

# ::snt I am not a Nazi, I do not support Nazis and I am very Pro-Israel. If any of this offends you PLEASE MUTE me and unfollow me..
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (p / political-movement
                  :polarity -
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Nazism")
                  :domain (ii / i))
            :op2 (s / support-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 p)
            :op3 (f / favor-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Israel"))
                  :degree (v / very)))
      :snt2 (h / have-condition-91
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (u / UTE-00
                        :mode imperative
                        :polite +
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG1 (ii2 / i))
                  :op2 (f2 / follow-02
                        :mode imperative
                        :polite +
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 ii2))
            :ARG2 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 (a3 / any
                        :ARG1-of (ii3 / include-91
                              :ARG2 (t / this)))
                  :ARG1 y)))
